text: Francisca Rico Martínez (13 October 1929 – 9 July 2017), better known as Paquita Rico, was a Spanish actress and singer. She was born in Triana, Seville. She appeared in 30 movies between 1948 and 1983. She starred in the movie Let's Make the Impossible!, which was entered into the 8th Berlin International Film Festival. Rico died at a hospital in Seville, Spain from pneumonia on 9 July 2017 at the age of 87.Muere la actriz y cantante Paquita Rico a los 87 años ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease-related deaths in Spain Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish singers Category:People from Seville
title: Paquita Rico
